game

Class SearchAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.SearchAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentPlayer

    public abstract class SearchAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentPlayer
    This is an asbtract class, all Search agents will inherit from it, it implements interface AgentPlayer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int discrN
      this value indicates how many divisions of one square unit are done in every dimension, so that one square unit will yield discrN x discrN possible states, if they are reachable.
      int numAngles
      this is in fact, the length of possibleAngles, it will be needed to indicate this number in the constructor when creating a Search agent
      protected double numExpandedNodes
      number of expanded nodes
      protected double numExploredNodes
      number of explored nodes
      protected double numGeneratedNodes
      number of generated nodes
      double[] possibleAngles
      array containing all possible angles for this agent movements
      double unit
      this indicate the length od the steps given by agent movements

      • possibleAngles

        public double[] possibleAngles
        array containing all possible angles for this agent movements

      • unit

        public double unit
        this indicate the length od the steps given by agent movements

      • discrN

        public static final int discrN
        this value indicates how many divisions of one square unit are done in every dimension, so that one square unit will yield discrN x discrN possible states, if they are reachable.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • numAngles

        public int numAngles
        this is in fact, the length of possibleAngles, it will be needed to indicate this number in the constructor when creating a Search agent

        public SearchAgent(int num)

        see images in url link for more detail

        Chooses a Movement for the agent player in the Game.

        move in interface AgentPlayer
